title: Komet
licensing_note: Lyrics via Musixmatch API; translations via Google Translate API; grammar notes auto-generated placeholders.

lines.text: Da-da-da
lines.translation: Da-da-da
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Da-dei, da-da
lines.translation: Da-dei, da-da
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Ich hör die Möwen sing'n am Hafen
lines.translation: I hear the seagulls singing at the harbor
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Das letzte Lied zum Rausschmiss
lines.translation: The last song about being kicked out
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Zähl schon lang nicht mehr die Jahre
lines.translation: I stopped counting the years a long time ago.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Die ich im dichten Rauch sitz
lines.translation: I sit in the thick smoke
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Hier war vorher mal 'ne andre Bar
lines.translation: There used to be another bar here.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Doch der Schnaps schmeckt noch genauso
lines.translation: But the schnapps still tastes the same.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Und wenn ich irgendwo zu Hause war
lines.translation: And when I was at home somewhere
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Dann immer dort, wo der Applaus tobt
lines.translation: Then always where the applause is thundering
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Und wenn ich geh, dann so, wie ich gekommen bin
lines.translation: And if I leave, then I'll leave in the same way I came.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Wie ein Komet, der zweimal einschlägt
lines.translation: Like a comet that hits twice.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Vielleicht tut es weh, doch will auf Nummer sicher geh'n
lines.translation: It might hurt, but I want to play it safe.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Dass ich für immer leb, lass uns nochmal aufdreh'n
lines.translation: That I live forever, let's turn it up again
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Und wenn ich geh, dann so, wie ich gekommen bin
lines.translation: And if I leave, then I'll leave in the same way I came.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.translation: It might hurt, but I want to play it safe.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Dass ich für immer leb, lass uns nochmal aufdreh'n
lines.translation: That I live forever, let's turn it up again
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Lass uns nochmal aufdreh'n
lines.translation: Let's turn it up again
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Nehm aus dem Club das Glas mit, Konfetti liegt auf den Straßen
lines.translation: Take the glass with you from the club; there's confetti on the streets.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Trage mit Stolz die Fahne, ex den allerletzten Schluck
lines.translation: Wear the flag with pride, down that very last sip.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: "Wo sind die letzten Tage?", frag ich den Taxifahrer
lines.translation: "Where are the last few days?" I ask the taxi driver.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Und er fragt mich, wat ick will, ich will nicht einschlafen
lines.translation: And he asks me what I want, I don't want to fall asleep.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Ich will ein'n Fußabdruck von mir, stärker als die Zeit
lines.translation: I want a footprint of myself, stronger than time.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Und ich sage dir: "Kein anderer Fuß passt da noch rein"
lines.translation: And I tell you: "No other foot will fit in there."
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Also bitte setz mich nicht zu Hause ab allein
lines.translation: So please don't drop me off at home alone.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Sie soll'n seh'n
lines.translation: They should see
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Ja, wenn ich geh, dann so, wie ich gekommen bin
lines.translation: Yes, if I leave, then I'll leave the way I came.
